description: You Buying One Turtle Horse Hair Pottery is fired using a special technique. Fine lines are created with the hair from the mane of the horse, and thick lines are created from the hair of the tail. This horse hair pottery is handcrafted by the Native American Navajo reservation in western New Mexico by Vail Family each piece is a unique, one of a kind, irreplaceable piece of art.
